objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Normally, defender is unable to detect.  Few agencies and commercial organizations may have unique insights.
objects.name: Create strategic plan
objects.description: Strategic plans outline the mission, vision, and goals for an adversary at a high level in relation to the key partners, topics, and functions the adversary carries out. (Citation: KPMGChina5Year) (Citation: China5YearPlans) (Citation: ChinaUN)
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Normal aspect of adversary planning lifecycle.  May not be done by all adversaries.

external_references.description: KPMG. (2016, October 19). China’s 13th Five-Year Plan signals a potential new era of Sino-foreign cooperation, finds KPMG report. Retrieved March 2, 2017.
Wikipedia contributors. (2017, February 8). Five-year plans of China. Retrieved March 2, 2017.
People's Republic of China. (2015, November). China's 13th Five-Year Plan. Retrieved May 19, 2017.
